The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Wednesday 

White Beans Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (white bean, celery, carrot, white onion, tomato, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Leek with Olives – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (leek, white onion, tomato, kalamata olives, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Seeds Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 50 g (sun flower seeds, pumpkin seeds, flaxseed, dehydrated tomatoes, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Wild Berry Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g  (cashews, almonds, cocoa butter, dates, wild berries,coconut, vanilla, lemon, unfiltered honey)
